Contact Us

We love to hear your comments and suggestions for SUMO! If there is someone you would like to hear speak, or some event that SUMO might want to think about organizing, please let us know!

For general questions and comments

email Edward Dai (sumo at math.stanford.edu or ejdai at stanford.edu)

To contact us about the website

email Lennart Jansson (sumo-webmaster at lists.stanford.edu)

To contact us about the Stanford Math Tournament

email the SMT coordinators (stanford.math.tournament at gmail.com)

For other more specific questions and comments, contact a person below.
